Issued at 04.00 p.m. on 09 February 2025
Mainly fair weather will prevail over most parts of the island.

F
airly strong winds of (30-40) kmph can be expected at times over Eastern slope of the central hills
and Northern, North-central, Eastern, North-western and Uva provinces and in Hambantota district.

and in Galle, Matara and Badulla districts during the morning.
